routing.overridesDescription: Specify which connection to use for specific destination countries. Overrides take precedence over defaults.

routing.testRoutingDescription: Enter a destination country to see which MCF connection would be used.

billing.title: Billing Acknowledgment
billing.subtitle: Please review and accept the billing terms before using the app.

billingDisclosure.title: Billing Terms

description.intro: This app charges based on the number of shipments processed through Amazon MCF:
description.tier1: Shipments 6-200: $20 one-time charge per month (billed when you reach the 6th shipment)
description.tier2: Shipments 201 and beyond: $0.50 per additional shipment

important.title: Important Notice
important.noReduction: Cancellations, returns, refunds do NOT reduce your shipment count or charges
important.chargesApply: Once a shipment is processed, the charge applies for that monthly cycle
important.nonRefundable: All charges are non-refundable within the monthly cycle

description.outro: By checking the box below, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these billing terms.

billingDisclosure.checkbox: I acknowledge and accept the billing terms above
billingDisclosure.checkboxError: Please accept the billing terms to continue

products.title: Product Mapping
products.subtitle: Configure which products are fulfilled by Amazon FBA
products.helpText: Enable products to be fulfilled from Amazon FBA inventory. Each variant must have a corresponding Amazon SKU.
products.searchPlaceholder: Search by product name or SKU...

shipments.title: Shipments
shipments.subtitle: Track and manage your fulfillment requests to Amazon
shipments.empty: No shipments found for the selected filter

OVERRIDE_CONNECTION_DISABLED.title: Override Connection Disabled
OVERRIDE_CONNECTION_DISABLED.message: Routing override points to a disabled connection.
OVERRIDE_CONNECTION_DISABLED.fix: Enable the connection in Settings or change the override to use an enabled connection.

DESTINATION_CONNECTION_NOT_ENABLED.title: Destination Connection Not Enabled
DESTINATION_CONNECTION_NOT_ENABLED.message: Destination is a marketplace country, but that connection is not enabled.
DESTINATION_CONNECTION_NOT_ENABLED.fix: Enable the connection for this marketplace in Settings, or set an override to use a different enabled connection.

NO_EU_ROUTE.title: No EU Route Configured
NO_EU_ROUTE.message: No EU route is configured for this destination country.
NO_EU_ROUTE.fix: Enable one of DE/FR/IT/ES connections and set it as the EU default in Settings, or add a specific override for this country.

NO_US_ROUTE.title: US Connection Required
NO_US_ROUTE.message: US destination requires the US connection to be enabled.
NO_US_ROUTE.fix: Enable the US connection in Settings. The US connection is required for US domestic shipments.

NO_JP_ROUTE.title: Japan Connection Required
NO_JP_ROUTE.message: Japan destination requires the JP connection to be enabled.
NO_JP_ROUTE.fix: Enable the JP (Japan) connection in Settings. The JP connection is required for Japan domestic shipments.

DESTINATION_NOT_SUPPORTED.title: Destination Not Supported
DESTINATION_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: Destination country is not supported by your enabled MCF connections.
DESTINATION_NOT_SUPPORTED.fix: Enable a connection that covers this destination (US, JP, or DE/FR/IT/ES for EU) or set a specific country override in Settings.

MAPPING_MISSING.title: Amazon SKU Missing
MAPPING_MISSING.message: Amazon SKU is missing for one or more items.
MAPPING_MISSING.fix: Go to Product Mapping and set the Amazon SKU for all FBA-enabled variants.

AMAZON_API_ERROR.title: Amazon API Error
AMAZON_API_ERROR.message: Failed to communicate with Amazon MCF API.
AMAZON_API_ERROR.fix: Check your Amazon MCF connection credentials. If the issue persists, contact Amazon MCF support.

CONNECTION_UNAVAILABLE.title: MCF Connection Unavailable
CONNECTION_UNAVAILABLE.message: The selected MCF connection is currently unavailable.
CONNECTION_UNAVAILABLE.fix: Check your Amazon MCF account status. You may need to re-connect the marketplace account.

UNKNOWN_ERROR.title: Unknown Error
UNKNOWN_ERROR.message: An unexpected error occurred during fulfillment.
UNKNOWN_ERROR.fix: Please try retrying the shipment. If the issue persists, contact support.

pendingRetry.title: Auto-Retry in Progress
pendingRetry.message: This shipment will be retried automatically. If all retries fail, it will be marked as FAILED.

mixedOrder.title: Mixed Order - Partial Fulfillment
mixedOrder.description: MCF items were fulfilled by Amazon Connector. Remaining items must be fulfilled separately (MFN) using your normal shipping process.
mixedOrder.notice: This order contains both MCF-fulfilled and MFN items.
mixedOrder.mfnItemsDescription: These items were not included in the Amazon MCF shipment and must be fulfilled manually.

billing.title: Billing & Usage
billing.subtitle: View your usage and charges for this month

connectionFee.title: Connection Fees
connectionFee.description: Monthly charge for enabled MCF connections. Separate from shipment-based charges.

disclaimer.title: Billing Disclaimer
disclaimer.noReductions: Note: Cancellations, returns, and refunds do NOT reduce your shipment count or any charges already applied for this monthly cycle.

connectionDisclaimer.title: Connection Fees Notice
connectionDisclaimer.description: Connection fees are billed monthly based on the number of enabled MCF connections. Changes take effect on the next billing cycle.
